verses.1: Tua ciangin a vekpi-in ding khia uh a, Pilat mai ah a paipih uh hi.
verses.2: Tua lai panin amah mawh zon ding kipan uh a, “Hih mipa in ka mipihte uh lam khialsakin, kumpipa tungah siah piak loh dingin thu gen a, a mahmah zong Khris ahi kumpi khat ahihna a kigenna zong ka za uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.3: Tua ciangin Pilat in, “Nang, Jew miteʼ kumpipa na hi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Nang zong tua mah nong ci hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.4: Tua ciangin Pilat in siampi liante le mihonte kiangah, “Hih mipa mawhsak nading thu bangmah ka mu kei hi,” a ci hi.
verses.5: Ahi zongin amaute in nawhsa takin nak pau semsem uh a, “Amah in mite a buai nadingin thu hilh a, Galilee gam pan hong kipanin Judea gam sung khempeuh ah hong hilh a, tu-in hih lai mun hong tung ta hi,” a ci uh hi.
verses.6: Pilat in hih thu a zak ciangin, “Hih mipa Galilee mi ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
verses.7: Jesu pen Herodʼ ukna sung mi ahih lam a theih ciangin, tua laitakin Herod mah zong Jerusalem ah om ahih manin ama kiangah a paisak hi.
verses.8: Herod in Jesuʼ thu zaza a, amah a muhnop sawt mahmah khinta ahih manin Jesu a muh ciangin a nuam mahmah hi. Jesu in nalamdang a bawlte a mu dingin kilamen hi.
verses.9: Tua ahih manin Herod in thu tampi tak dong a, ahi zongin Jesu in kam khat beek dawng lo hi.
verses.10: Siampi liante le Thukham hilh siate in hong neh uh a, Jesu mawhsakna thu nakpi takin hong gen uh hi.
verses.11: Tua ciangin Herod le galkapte in Jesu zahko-in simmawh bawl uh a, kumpi puan tualpi a silhsak khit uh ciangin Pilat kiangah a puakkik uh hi.
verses.12: Hih hun ma-in Herod le Pilat kilem loin kigal bawl uh a, ahi zongin tua ni mahmah in amau tegel kilem kikin kipawl bawl uh hi.
verses.13: Pilat in zong siampi liante, upate le mihonpite sam khawmin,
verses.14: amaute kiangah, “Hih mipa in i mipihte lam khialsak hi, ci-in mawhsakin kei kiangah nong paipih uh hi. Note khempeuh mai mahah amah thu ka sit a, amah na mawhsakna uh thute khat beek ah a mawhna ka mu kei hi.
verses.15: Tua mah bangin Herod in zong ama mawhna mu lo a, eite kiangah amah hong puakkik hi. Hih mipa in sihna a thuak nadingin ama gamtatna bangmah om lo hi.
verses.16: Tua ahih manin amah satna tawh thuhilhin ka khah ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.17: (Paisan Pawi hun simin Pilat in amauteʼ deih thong kia khat a khah ding ahi hi.)
verses.18: Tua ciangin mihon khempeuh kiko uh a, “Amah that in! Barabbas hong khahsak in!” a ci uh hi.
verses.19: Barabbas pen khua sungah mi a buaisakna hang le mi a thahna hangin thong sungah a kikhum ahi hi.
verses.20: Pilat in Jesu khah nuam ahih manin mihonpite tungah khatvei a genkik hi.
verses.21: Ahi zongin mihonpite in, “Singlamteh tungah that in, singlamteh tungah that in,” ci-in a kiko uh hi.
verses.22: Tua ciangin amaute tungah a thum veina thu gen a, “Amah in bang mawhna bawl ahi hiam? Sihna a thuak nadingin ama gamtatna bangmah ka mu kei hi. Tua ahih manin amah satin ka khah ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.23: Ahi zongin a aw neihzah uh tawh amaute awng semsem uh a, singlamteh tungah Jesu a thah nading gen uh ahih manin a tawpna ah a zo uh hi.
verses.24: Tua ahih manin amauteʼ ngetna bangin piak dingin Pilat in thu a khen hi.
verses.25: Mi buaisakna le mi thahna hangin thong sungah a kikhia mipa amauʼ ngetna bangin khah a, amauʼ deihna bangin a bawl dingun Jesu a pia khia hi.
verses.26: Tua ciangin amaute in Jesu paikhiatpih uh a, gam sung panin khuapi sungah a hong pai, Sairin khuami Simon a kici mi khat tawh a kituak uh hi. Amaute in tua pa man pah uh a, a singlamteh suanin Jesuʼ nung zui-in a puasak uh hi.
verses.27: Jesuʼ nung zui-in mi tampi tak pai uh a, tuate lakah Jesu kahin a tamlawh numei pawl khat zong a kihel hi.
verses.28: Jesu zong amaute lamah kihei a, “Jerusalem khua numeite aw, kei hong kah kei unla, note le na tate uh adingin kap un.
verses.29: Bang hang hiam cih leh mite in, ‘Ta a nei ngei lo, naungek nawi a teepsak ngei lo numei ciingte mi hampha mahmah ahi hi,’ a cih hun hong tung ding hi.
verses.30: Tua hun hong tun ciangin mite in, ‘Mual lian mual neute in hong cipnelhin a si khin hi lehang ut zaw hang,’ ci ding uh hi.
verses.31: Singkung hing bang ahi kei tungah hih bangin hong bawl uh ahihleh singkung keu bang ahi note tungah hong nak hih zaw kan ding uh hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.32: Mi that ahi, thong a kikhum mi nih zong, Jesu tawh thah khawm dingin a paipih uh hi.
verses.33: “Lutang Guh,” a kicihna mun a tun uh ciangin singlamteh tungah Jesu kilhcip uh a, tua mi that mi nihte zong, Jesuʼ tak lamah khat, a veilamah khat kilhcip uh hi.
verses.34: Ahi zongin Jesu in, “Pa aw, amaute in bang hih ihi hiam cih thei lo uh ahih manin a mawhna uh na maisak in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amauʼ ngah ding ciat a theih nadingun aisanin a puante a hawm uh hi.
verses.35: Jew mi upate in Jesu zahko-in, “Amah in midangte hon khia hi. Pasian teel sa Khris ahih takpi leh amah le amah kihon khia tahen,” ci-in a simmawh bawl laitakun tua lai-a ding mite in a enen uh hi.
verses.36: Galkapte in zong zahpih bawl uh a, a kiangah hong pai-in leenggahzu thuk pia uh a,
verses.37: “Jew Miteʼ Kumpipa na hih takpi leh nang le nang kihon khia in,” a ci uh hi.
verses.38: “Jew Miteʼ Kumpipa hi,” ci-in a kigelh lai zong ama tung sanah kisuang hi.
verses.39: Amah tawh a kikhai khawm mi that pa khat in zong Jesu zahko a, “Nang Khris hi lo na hi hiam? Nangmah kihon khia inla, tua ciangin kote zong hong hon khia in,” a ci hi.
verses.40: Ahi zongin a khat pa in a lawmpa taii a, “Pasian nangawn kihta lo na hi hiam? I vekpi-in gim hong kipiakna kibang kim hi.
verses.41: Ei tegel pen i gamtatna tawh kizui-in thu hong kikhen ahih manin ahi ding mah ahi hi. Ahi zongin amah in khialhna bangmah nei lo hi,” a cih khit ciangin
verses.42: Jesu kiangah, “Jesu aw, Kumpi-in nong pai ciangin kei zong hong phawk in,” a ci hi.
verses.43: Jesu in ama kiangah, “A mantakin keʼn kong cih in ah: Tu ni-in Paradais ah kei tawh na om khawm ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.44: Tua hun laitak pen sunkim nai sawm le nih pawl hi a, ni mial ahih manin nitak lam nai thum ciang dong leitung khempeuh ah khua mial a,
verses.45: tua hun sungin biakinn sung dalna puan kikekin phel nih a suak hi.
verses.46: Tua ciangin nakpi takin Jesu kiko a, “Pa aw, nangma khut sungah keimah kong ki-ap hi,” a cih khit ciangin a si ta hi.
verses.47: Galkap mangpa in hih thupiang a muh ciangin Pasian phat a, “Hih pa, mihoih taktak khat ahi hi,” a ci hi.
verses.48: Hih thute a en dingin a hong pai mihonpite in a thupiang teng a muh uh ciangin dahin dip hum sa-in a ciah uh hi.
verses.49: Galilee gam panin Jesu a hong zui amah a thei ngei mite le numeite in gal et uh ahih manin a thupiang khempeuh a thei uh hi.
verses.50: Tua laitakin Josef a kici mi khat om a, Judea gam sunga om Arimathea khuami ahi hi. Amah pen mihoih, a zahtakhuai mi khat hi a, Pasianʼ Uk ding hun lamenin a ngakngak mi khat ahi hi. Amah pen ulian thu vaihawm sunga kihel hi a, ahi zongin a lawmteʼ vaihawmna le a nasepnate uh thukimpih lo hi.
verses.52: Hih mipa Pilat kiangah va pai-in Jesuʼ luang a ngen hi.
verses.53: Tua ciangin Jesuʼ luang la suk a, puan kang tawh a tun khit ciangin kuamah a kivui ngei nai lohna suang kikhuak hankhuk sungah a vui hi.
verses.54: Tua ni pen nipi zawh ni nga ni hi a, Sabbath ni hong hi dektak ta hi.
verses.55: Galilee gam panin a hong zui numeite in zong a kivuina ah zui uh ahih manin a han phual le a luang kisial zia khempeuh zong a mu uh hi.
verses.56: Tua ciangin amaute ciah uh a, Jesuʼ luang a nuh dingun paknamtui le sathau a bawl khol uh hi. Thukham zui-in Sabbath ni tawlnga-in a om uh hi.
